LanguageData.FT_ArcFurnace.label: Electric arc furnace
LanguageData.FT_ArcFurnace.description: A heavy smelter for recycling all sorts of metallic pieces into steel. Generates a lot of heat.
LanguageData.FT_HeavyChem.label: Pyrolysis plant
LanguageData.FT_HeavyChem.description: Heavy machinery for recycling all sorts of organic materials into chemfuel. Generates a lot of heat.
LanguageData.FT_transformer.label: Transformer cabinet
LanguageData.FT_transformer.description: Increases work speed when placed near an industrial workbench. One workbench can link up with up to eight transformer cabinets. May explode when damaged.
LanguageData.FT_CitadelGenerator.label: Stationary chemfuel generator
LanguageData.FT_CitadelGenerator.description: A chemfuel generator suitable for use in large fortresses. Entrenched and fortified for excellent safety and fuel capacity, but can be a hassle to deconstruct.
LanguageData.FTC_FieldKitchen.label: Field kitchen
LanguageData.FTC_FieldKitchen.description: A mobile kitchen for cooking meals in the field, although the selection of said meals is quite limited. Requires chemfuel or wood as fuel.
